blog.name: cloverbell13
blog.title: MOSTLY MARVEL...
blog.description: 22, she/her. I write... sometimes. Mostly I just obsess over Marvel, IRON DAD, sometimes StarWars, reblog fanart, memes, and make fanfic recommendations.    My AO3

title: Homeless Peter Parker AU
body:
CHAPTER 4 NOW UP

Spiderman: Without a Home

A03: CloverBell13 (due to Tumblrs recent update, I can’t provide a link, however, if you just go to archiveofourown, and then paste this after the URL, you should be able to find it)                                                          /works/16201919/chapters/39295006       

There was blood on his hands— on his clothes and shoes, and on his face from where he had been wiping at the never ending stream of tears. But it wasn’t his blood…

Ben and May were dead.

And it was all his fault.
—
Tragedy strikes again, claiming the lives of the last of Peter Parker’s family, leaving him little choice but to run away to hide these new ‘powers’ that have essentially ruined his life.

Homeless Peter AU where both May and Ben are killed by the mugger (and of course, Peter blames himself)

blog.description: I don't know what I'm doing, so let's just fly by the seat of our pants and see what's doing, shall we?  I'm on AO3, writing fanfic that gives me feels.

i love potato gun son and spider son with all my heart
summary: SI Internship Team - rebelmeg - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: SI Internship Team - rebelmeg - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Tony Stark & Harley Keener, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Iron Dad and his Science Sons, Background Pepperony - Relationship, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark
Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Harley Keener, Friday (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Ned Leeds
Additional Tags: Iron Dad and his Science Sons - Freeform, Iron Dad and his Potato Gun Son, Iron Dad and his Spider Son, Tony Stark Has A Heart, MIT bros, Fluff and Humor, background pepperony, Parent Tony Stark, sorta - Freeform
Summary:

Tony’s got two good kids spinning great ideas in his lab on a regular basis. It was inevitable that he took their research and efforts a step further.

I JUST REALLY LOVE IRON DAD AND HIS SCIENCE SONS, OKAY?!  (Also Rhodey and Friday being sassy little monsters, that is also the best.)

Throw money at me: http://ko-fi.com/V7V6IXJK.
Long live the irondick!
...
I guess this is a Peter and Stephen stan blog now.

summary:
Tony, internally: Wait, is he into me? Quick, make a bad joke and see if he laughs.
Tony: Did you hear about the skeleton at the...
body:
Tony, internally: Wait, is he into me? Quick, make a bad joke and see if he laughs.
Tony: Did you hear about the skeleton at the party? He had NO BODY to go with!
Stephen: *laughs* That's really funny!
Tony, internally: Well, that's not a fair test - that joke's hilarious.

dialogue.name: Tony, internally
dialogue.label: Tony, internally:
dialogue.phrase: Wait, is he into me? Quick, make a bad joke and see if he laughs.

ao3feedmonster@gmail.com

title: Idol of Chaos
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RgGAX5

by Gyptian

Loki spent years running from Thanos, only to be caught. Tony spent years learning how to defend against Thanos, only to be defeated. Pepper spent years trying to soothe Tony’s fears, only to see them come true. Thanos spent decades on his crusade and succeeded.

But that’s only the first half of the story, because none of them ever learned how to stop fighting.

Words: 2057, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M, Multi
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Thor (Marvel), Hella (Marvel), Thanos (Marvel), Wong (Marvel), Nebula (Marvel), Rocket Raccoon, Steve Rogers, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Spiderman, Stephen Strange, Shuri (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Friday (Marvel), Gamora (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Loki & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Loki & Thor (Marvel)
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Canon Divergence - Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Tony Stark Has A Heart, Loki & Tony Stark Friendship, Jotunn Loki (Marvel), Genderfluid Character, Genderfluid Loki (Marvel), Asexual Character, Polyamory, Poly Pepperony, Spirit World, Metaphysical Shenanigans, Mindscapes, Character Study, aftermath of death, Because Infinity War, Past Mind Control, Because Scarlet Witch, Loki (Marvel) Does What He Wants, Religious Imagery & Symbolism, Because Mindscapes, Loki Does What She Wants, Pepper Potts Has A Tony, Friday Does What She Wants, Stark AI, Sentient AI, Alien Lives Matter, Human Lives Matter, Regular Lives Matter, Regular People Can Be Heroes, Consequences, Infinity Stones, meddlesome gods, Awesome Villain Reprisal, Marvel Needs More Hella


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RgGAX5

blog.name: sultan-78
blog.title: Untitled
blog.description:
A place to write my thoughts.

I like Marvel, DC, Harry Potter & Star Wars.

I have my specific ships and otps.

Multi-fandom

summary: Truth hurts, doesn’t it? Next time anyone considers Peter & Tony a father & son team, REMEMBER that they hated each other in the...
body:
Truth hurts, doesn’t it? Next time anyone considers Peter & Tony a father & son team, REMEMBER that they hated each other in the comics. Maybe MCU was a good thing for Tony Stark’s character(although I wouldn’t completely consider him nice especially not in Homecoming) but let’s not forgot what actually happened.

@twistedpurity @animesshadow @prettyblackkitty

reblog.comment:

Maybe MCU was a good thing for Tony Stark’s character(although I wouldn’t completely consider him nice especially not in Homecoming) but let’s not forgot what actually happened.

blog.name: shinysoroka
blog.title: Where the brave live forever
blog.description:
This blogger loves and respects Thor Odinson. And cats. Cats are nice.

She/her, +18.

summary:
Thor: (to Tony) So, you and Pepper, huh? Congratulations!
Tony: Thanks! So you and Jane, huh?
Thor: Yeah...
Tony: Sorry.
body:
Thor: (to Tony) So, you and Pepper, huh? Congratulations!
Tony: Thanks! So you and Jane, huh?
Thor: Yeah...
Tony: Sorry.

dialogue.name: Thor
dialogue.label: Thor:
dialogue.phrase: (to Tony) So, you and Pepper, huh? Congratulations!

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Thanks! So you and Jane, huh?

summary:
Loki:Who is the sexiest man in the entire universe?
Loki:The answer is m-
Tony,yells from another room:STEPHEN VINCENT...
body:
Loki:Who is the sexiest man in the entire universe?

Loki:The answer is m-

Tony,yells from another room:STEPHEN VINCENT STRANGE!!!

blog.name: hoe4parker
blog.title: hoe4stark
blog.description:
Lauren//19//TX

I love all things starker but have also developed the taste for pretty much any MCU ship

requests are always open :))

title: Poorly Closeted Bisexual™️ Peter Parker
body:
I mentioned myself being a Poorly Closeted Bisexual™️ and also loved the idea of Peter being a PCB as well so

  • Peter not being able to hide his sexuality AT ALL despite thinking he’s still in the closet
  • Ned and MJ totally know even without the boy outwardly saying it bc of his constant joking about being bi
  • May finding a bi flag in his room and just laughing bc is he even trying????
  • Peter outwardly showing interest in men and totally leaves his Tinder settings on the “both” option and making comments about it right and left
  • When he does actually come out though… oh boy
  • “WHAT DO YOU MEAN YOU KNOW?”
  • Literally the entire school knowing Peter Parker is a bicon (bi icon)
  • Peter spilling an entire novel to Tony about how he likes boys but he also likes girls and Tony just standing there with a bewildered look in his eyes bc
  • “Peter, you sucked me off this morning. I knew you weren’t completely straight.”

Writing blog for geekymoviemom. Iron Dad, Superfamily, and Everlark. My AO3

main blog

title: Sins of the Fathers Chapter 23
body:
I hope all of my American readers had a lovely Thanksgiving last week!  ♥️

As always, a huge thank-you to @stjohn27 my awesome prereader and sounding board.  :)

Tony watched with thinly-veiled amusement as the Midtown High Academic Decathlon team boarded the Stark Industries jet, most of them oohing and aahing as they made their way down the narrow passageway to their seats.

“This is so awesome!” one of the students—a boy with dark blue glasses who’s name Tony couldn’t remember—said as he passed Tony on his way towards the back of the plane. “Thank you so much, Mr. Stark!”

“Sure thing, kid,” Tony replied, winking at Peter as he sat down next to Ned a couple rows back, with Sam Wilson already settled into the single seat across the aisle. Peter had told Tony that Liz had originally been less-than-thrilled with the prospect of flying down to D.C. because she’d been counting on having the hours during the school bus ride to conduct drills with the team. But once Liz realized that getting down to D.C. that much faster meant that she could conduct her drills in the comfort of their hotel instead of on the stuffy, uncomfortable school bus, she relented, and even now was leaning back in one of the plush leather seats near the front as the plane prepared for takeoff.

“Um, excuse me, M—, Mr. Stark, sir?” asked the decathlon coach, what was his name again? Harborton? “Um, I just wanted to thank you, sir, for your generosity in allowing the team to use your private plane, sir, and—”

“Yeah, yeah,” Tony said, dismissively waving his hand. “It’s not a problem, Mr. Harborton.”

“Harrington, sir,” said the coach, pushing his oversized glasses up the bridge of his nose. “And I just wanted to let you know, if there’s anything I can do at all to show my appreciation for—”

“That kid,” interrupted Tony, jerking his head in the direction of the dark-haired boy just entering the plane, his face twisted into the same scowl that Tony usually saw him wearing. “What’s his name?”

“Um…” Mr. Harrington mumbled. “That is Flash Thompson, sir. He’s one of the alternates on the team.”

“Alternates?” asked Tony.

“Yes, sir,” said Mr. Harrington. “The rules of the Academic Decathlon require students with a wide diversity of achievement, as they call it, and while Mr. Thompson falls into the Scholastic Category, we already have three other students in that category who qualified ahead of him. But we bring the alternates anyway just in case someone were to fall ill, or—”

“Excellent, yes, thank you,” Tony said as politely as he could. “I’d like to speak with Mr. Thompson, if you don’t mind.”

Read more on AO3/ FFN :)
